document.full_text: the 6-year-old boy who brought a gun to his school cafeteria in houston was showing it off to a classmate when it fired, injuring him and two other kindergarten students, houston police said on thursday.
document.title: kindergarten boy was showing off gun when it fired
lines_and_colors: the 6-year-old boy who brought a gun to his school cafeteria in houston was showing it off to a classmate when it fired, injuring him and two other kindergarten students, houston police said on thursday.
